frontmatter.title: Hosting
frontmatter.description: Overview of different hosting options for sites built using the Carbon Gatsby theme

internal.content:
---
title: Hosting
description:
  Overview of different hosting options for sites built using the Carbon Gatsby
  theme
---

<PageDescription>

When building sites using the Carbon Gatsby Theme, there are a number of
different ways you can host your site. While the Carbon team does not have an
opinionated stance on how you host your projects, these are some resources
others have found helpful for hosting.

</PageDescription>

## GH Pages

[GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/) pages is a simple, low maintenance approach to get your site hosted quickly. For internal sites, or sites with proprietary information. Regardless of whether your projects is external or internal, there are a few steps (see below) to allow your site to work with GitHub Pages.

[Get started](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/how-gatsby-works-with-github-pages/)

## GH Pages

[GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/) pages is a simple, low maintenance approach to get your site hosted quickly. For internal sites, or sites with proprietary information. Regardless of whether your projects is external or internal, there are a few steps (see below) to allow your site to work with GitHub Pages.

[Get started](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/how-gatsby-works-with-github-pages/)
